title: kgangadhar
name: Karthik Gangadhar
description: Hello there, I'm Karthik Gangadhar. I'm a professional Software developer working mostly on the web services. Enjoy building web apps using Node.js and Ruby-on-Rails technologies. Currently working as a full stack developer at Brillio. While I'm mostly in backend development, I'm pretty much comfortable working with bootstrap and similar kind technologies. Now a days learning Angularjs to enhance my skillset. Apart from coding, I'm also good at playing cricket & foosball.

skills.description: Here are some the skills that I'm using now a days. These are just the web technologies I've learnt for my profession.

npm_modules.title: Ape-Cricket
npm_modules.description: The ape-cricket is a rest-api exported as Node.js module. The live cricket score, player statistics and fantasy scorecard API allow you to get API data anytime, 24x7 at your fingertips. It's extremely simple, easy to use - with a huge collection of examples.

npm_modules.title: Stack-Exchange
npm_modules.description: The stack-exchange is a npm module created over stack-exchange api. The module will let you get stackoverflow data and as follwing sections: Users section, Me section, Questions section, Answers section, Badges section, Tags section, Comments section, Posts section, Search section, Suggested Edits section , Network section, Info section, Privilages section, Revisions section, Events section

ruby_gems.title: CricApi
ruby_gems.description: This is ruby gem for www.cricapi.com live data access. The live cricket score, player statistics and fantasy scorecard API allow you to get API data anytime, 24x7 at your fingertips. It's extremely simple, easy to use - with a huge collection of examples.

projects.title: Pencil-Run
projects.summary: The Pencil-Run is Race Game created using python and pygame
projects.description: The Pencil-Run is Race Game created using Google doodles little student pencil animations for Teacher’s Day 2016. The animation shows a five pencils, where one of them represents a teacher, wearing spectacles and reading a book, while four other little student pencils can be seen walking behind the teacher with much enthusiasm.

projects.title: cricketlive
projects.description: CricketLive is a rails 5 application build to provide UI for cric-api endpoints. In this project I used ruby on rails, html, javascript & bootstarp to render the pages. Have modelled the data consuming & integrating the api’s built in nodes , then performing the business logic in model only as per the fronted requirement & then rendering the pages.

projects.title: apecricket REST api
projects.description: ApeCricket is REST api created over cricapi endpoints. The project used hapijs for providing rest structure along with lab, chai and good testing frame works with code coverage of 95%.

experience.description: Currently I'm working on Brillio technologies. Developed Restful Api’s in Nodejs using framework Hapi/Expressjs with mongodb & redis for one of the big real estate site in US http://www.realtor.com/ Worked on presentation layer for the real estate site realtor.com using rails framework, modeling data consumed from other restful apis & rendering to frontend Responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users in api development Responsible for coding in highly agile environment creating complex & enterprise-transforming solutions in Nodejs Development of all server-side logic, definition and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end

testimonials.name: Craig White
testimonials.description: Great at interpreting a brief project description and very good at finding solutions to issues. Honest, reliable and professional. Faysal is on my speed dial for future projects.
